caption:
This photograph captures a scene in a scientific or medical laboratory environment, featuring four individuals, presumably scientists or medical professionals, who are predominantly looking towards the camera.

A man in the foreground is partly cropped from the left side of the frame and is wearing eyeglasses. He dons a white laboratory coat and has dark hair. Behind him, three additional individuals in white lab coats stand next to a large piece of scientific equipment, which appears to be a control panel with various buttons and displays.

The woman, the only female in the group, stands slightly apart from the other two men in the background; her arms are folded, and she has a focused look. She has long dark hair and wears minimal jewelry.

Next to her, two men lean casually against the equipment. The first man in the center of the image has dark, receding hair and a serious expression. He places his arms on the equipment, suggesting a relaxed but attentive posture. The third man, on the far right, mirrors this posture and also looks directly at the camera. He appears younger, with a full head of dark hair and a somewhat softer expression than the other individuals.

In the background, the room is utilitarian, with plain walls, part of a window with blinds visible, and what appears to be diagnostic or recording equipment visible on shelves. The room gives off an academic or clinical atmosphere, emphasizing the purposeful nature of the group's work.

Overall, the composition, with its mix of focused expressions and strategic placement around the equipment, conveys a sense of professionalism and the seriousness of their scientific or medical pursuits.
title: Staff for the Laboratory of Physical Organic Chemistry at the Ruder Boskovic Institute
